title: Range Detection Application
description: Detect and measure objects within a predefined range using radar and PSOC™ 6.
long_description: This application demonstrates the use of Infineon's XENSIV™ 60 GHz radar sensor radar sensor (BGT60TR13C) and PSOC™ 6 MCU to detect objects and estimate their distance within a predefined range in real time. The solution performs on-device radar signal processing for accurate, low-latency, and privacy-preserving range measurement.

links.heading: Try Today
links.sub-heading: Test out the Entrance Counter for BGT60TR13C™ Radar
